question: What is the purpose of the <head> tag in HTML?
options: To define the main content of the page
To provide metadata about the document
To create a header for the page
answer: To provide metadata about the document

question: What is the purpose of the <body> tag in HTML?
options: To define the main content of the page
To provide metadata about the document
To create a header for the page
answer: To define the main content of the page

question: What is the purpose of the <title> tag in HTML?
options: To define the main content of the page
To provide metadata about the document
To create a header for the page
answer: To provide metadata about the document
